name: Orbital Threat
description:
Hmmm.. My super power can be... running away from problems.. but my orbs (friends) around me did not left me alone, not a single time for gods sake.. They are always coming along with me (huh) while I'm running away and they always try to handle issues around me (ok) Sometimes I find myself thinking about "stop running and fight with problems yourself" but I can't... You know.. I can't.. It seems running away is the best idea since the years of Socrates.

Credits: 

- Burak Kayalak - Code & Design & 3D Model (small object)

Note:  

Music and SFX are not belong to me. A few items from Unity Starter Pack used. 

Keyboard

Movement: WASD

Camera: Mouse

Jump: Space

Sprint: Left Shift

Invincibility: Left Ctrl or F

Pause Game: Esc

Restart Level: R

Gamepad

Movement: Left Stick

Camera: Right Stick

Jump: Button South (Xbox: A , PS: X)

Sprint: Left Trigger

Invincibility: Right Trigger

Pause Game: Select Button

Restart Level: Start Button

Tip: Use your invincibility and sprint together for maximum impact. But be careful, you have cooldowns.
